#include<stdio.h>
#include<stdlib.h>
main()
{
	int i,j,k,t,n,m,count,l;
	scanf("%d",&t);
	for(l=0;l<t;l++)
	{
		scanf("%d",&m);
		scanf("%d",&n);
		count=0;
		int **A;
		
		A = (int **)malloc(m*sizeof(int *));
		
		for(j=0;j<m;j++)
		{
			A[j] = (int *)malloc(n*sizeof(int));
			for(k=0;k<n;k++)
			{
				scanf("%d",&A[j][k]);
			}
			
		}
		j=0;
		i=0;
		while(1)
		{
			if(i+1 > m-1 && j+1 > n-1)
			{
				break;
			}
			else if(i+1 > m-1 && j+1 <= n-1)
			{
				if(A[i][j+1] == 2147483647)
				{
					break;
				}
				else{
				A[i][j] = A[i][j+1];
				j++;
				count++;
				}
			}
			else if(i+1 <= m-1 && j+1 > n-1)
			{
				if(A[i+1][j] == 2147483647)
				{
					break;
				}
				else{
				A[i][j] = A[i+1][j];
				i++;
				count++;
				}
			}
			else if(A[i+1][j] == 2147483647 && A[i][j+1] == 2147483647)
			{
				break;
			}
			else if(A[i+1][j] > A[i][j+1])
			{
				A[i][j] = A[i][j+1];
				j = j+1;
				count++;
				
			}
			else if(A[i+1][j] < A[i][j+1])
			{
				A[i][j] = A[i+1][j];
				i++;
				count++;
				
			}
		}
		printf("%d\n",count);
	}
}
